channel.title: Arsenal on EMBA BEYOND
channel.description: Recent content in Arsenal on EMBA BEYOND

item.title: EMBA goes to Vegas baby
item.description: It’s official, in August Pascal and myself will present the firmware security analyzer EMBA at Black Hat and DEF CON in Las Vegas. We are super excited and happy to have the possibility to show you the best firmware scanner on the best stage! As this is not enough, we are planning to release a huge update for EMBA … stay tuned You can find further details at the Black Hat USA Arsenal page and the DEF CON 30 forum

item.title: Join us at Black Hat Asia
item.description: You can attend the Black Hat Business Hall for free - check it out and join our talk on firmware analysis with EMBA here.

item.title: Black Hat Asia with EMBA
item.description: It’s official, in May Pascal and myself will present EMBA the firmware security scanner at Black Hat ASIA 2022. We are super excited and happy to have the possibility to show you the best firmware scanner on the best stage! You can find further details at the Black Hat Asia Arsenal page.
